subject: Alpine Skiing
Olympic Games
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Sailer was a charismatic and celebrated Austrian skier who became the first to win three gold medals in Alpine skiing in the same Olympic Games, in 1956.
snippet: Mr. Sailer was a charismatic and celebrated Austrian skier who became the first to win three gold medals in Alpine skiing in the same Olympic Games, in 1956.
